p: The use of EOs as additives and preservatives has a long history, and the use of these compounds along with their toxicity has been considered. One of the substantial aspects of EOs is that they are generally low-risk products. It has been reported by various studies that EOs and their chemical components possess a range of 1 to 20-g/kg body weight for LD50 values, but some exceptions are also observed ( 114).
